<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 44</row>

**Perception** +17

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Shadowtongue](/Languages.aspx?ID=21)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Shadow Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +26, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +15, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), _+1 [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, _The Extraplanar Registry_, [keys to each dormitory door and slave manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [good manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) (marked with the symbol of the Scarlet Triad), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)_

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 170

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_morningstar_ +20 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 32, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180)
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) (Ã—2)
- **3rd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323), [Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=363)

**Wizard School Spells** DC 22, 2 Focus Points
- **6th**
[Augment Summoning](/Spells.aspx?ID=521), [Dimensional Steps](/Spells.aspx?ID=524)

**Rituals** 

- **6th**
[Planar Binding](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17)

**Drain Bonded Item** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** Barushak hasn't acted yet on this turn. **Effect** This turn, Barushak can cast one prepared spell he has already cast today without spending a spell slot. He must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

**Efficient Capture** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** Barushak has [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) in hand and is adjacent to a creature. **Effect** Barushak attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. He must succeed at an attack roll with a +21 modifier against the target's AC.

**Fiend Summoner**   Barushak can cast [_summon fiend_](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) spells as arcane spells. Each time he does so, sinister energies flow through his body, causing his eyes to glow red and making him [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 3 rounds. He can use the extra action only to Sustain the Spell.

**Superlative Summoner**   If another creature's reaction would disrupt Barushak's spellcasting action, Barushak attempts a DC 15 flat check. If he succeeds, his action isn't disrupted.

</column>
